(JP, where is Hell Beast inside his old ship?)


Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:



Double Punch ran a scan of the ship from Manterror's room.  They had locked 
themselves in their, not wishing to take any sides.  Just trying to think of 
a way to get back to Cybertron.

"Hell Beast!"

"What?" Manterror asked, the green monster getting up.

"Hell Beast is onboard this ship!"

"You're crazy, Double.  He split.  The slagging coward..."

"No, no!  The scans say he is here!"

"Well, fine, let's go find him!  It's better than sitting around here 
waiting!" Bumblebee yelled.

The four Predacons nodded, leaving Manterror's chambers, heading for where 
Double Punch's scans said Hell Beast was.

"This way!" Double Punch said, activating his cloaking device and going into 
stealth mode.  Now the other three Predacons simply followed his voice.
